statements: DELETE FROM game_logs WHERE player_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM game_logs WHERE action = 'attack' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM game_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM game_logs WHERE player_id = 200);
DELETE FROM game_logs WHERE player_id = 1 AND action = 'start';
DELETE FROM game_logs WHERE log_id = 1234 AND player_id = 5678
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND level = 10
DELETE FROM levels WHERE level_name = 'Beginner' AND difficulty = 'Easy'
DELETE FROM game_logs WHERE log_id = 123 AND player_id = 456;
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM progress WHERE level_completed = FALSE);
DELETE FROM actions WHERE action_name = 'logout' AND action_id NOT IN (SELECT action_id FROM game_logs);
DELETE FROM GameLogs WHERE game_id = 1 AND player_id = 5
DELETE FROM Players WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM PlayerInventory WHERE item_id = 10)
DELETE FROM Levels WHERE level_id = (SELECT level_id FROM Players WHERE player_name = 'John')
